member.name: T:MurrayGrant.ReadablePassphrase.Dictionaries.DictionaryParseException
member.summary: Thrown if a parsing error occurs within a dictionary.

member.name: T:MurrayGrant.ReadablePassphrase.Dictionaries.InvalidDictionaryLoaderArgumentException
member.summary: Thrown if the arguments dictionary passed to the IDictionaryLoader are invalid.

member.name: T:MurrayGrant.ReadablePassphrase.Dictionaries.UnableToLoadDictionaryException
member.summary: Thrown if an IDictionaryLoader cannot load the dictionary.

member.name: T:MurrayGrant.ReadablePassphrase.Dictionaries.WordDictionary
member.summary: A dictionary is a collection of words categorised by parts of speech.

member.name: M:MurrayGrant.ReadablePassphrase.Dictionaries.WordDictionary.InitWordsByTypeLookup
member.summary: Dictionary loaders should call this to initialise a dictionary of word type (part of speech) -> ordered list of words. Gives an order of magnitude performance benefit over linear lookups.

member.name: T:MurrayGrant.ReadablePassphrase.Words.Word
member.summary: Represents each word in a dictionary.
